mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN t1.STATUS=2 THEN ((CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(content)<66 THEN 1 ELSE TRUNCATE(((CHAR_LENGTH(content)+4)/67),0)+1 END)) ELSE 0 END) AS sucessCount, SUM(CASE WHEN (t1.STATUS=-1) THEN ((CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(content)<66 THEN 1 ELSE TRUNCATE(((CHAR_LENGTH(content)+4)/67),0)+1 END)) ELSE 0 END) AS failCount, SUM(CASE WHEN (t1.STATUS=1) THEN ((CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(content)<66 THEN 1 ELSE TRUNCATE(((CHAR_LENGTH(content)+4)/67),0)+1 END)) ELSE 0 END) AS sentCount, SUM(CASE WHEN (t1.STATUS=0) THEN ((CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(content)<66 THEN 1 ELSE TRUNCATE(((CHAR_LENGTH(content)+4)/67),0)+1 END)) ELSE 0 END) AS sendingCount, t2.sms_vendor_name AS groupName
,DATE_FORMAT(submit_time,'%Y-%m') AS groupDate
,DATE_FORMAT(submit_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS groupDate
FROM tb_sms t1 left join tb_sms_vendor t2 on t1.sms_vendor_id=t2.sms_vendor_id WHERE submit_time BETWEEN #{startSubmitTime} AND #{endSubmitTime} GROUP BY groupName
,groupDate
ORDER BY groupName
,groupDate
